description: Holds the config/defaults for user creation

usernameAttribute.description: SAML attribute used to populate the user's username (has to be a unique value in folio)

emailAttribute.description: SAML attribute used to populate the user's email

firstNameAttribute.description: SAML attribute used to populate the user's first name

firstNameDefault.description: Default first name to to use when a value can not be obtained from the SAML attribute

lastNameDefault.description: Default last name to to use when a value can not be obtained from the SAML attribute
